TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SettingsProperty extends System.Object

summary.span: 在內部會當做類別使用，此類別表示與個別組態屬性有關的中繼資料。

span.span: Used internally as the class that represents metadata about an individual configuration property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來描述設定屬性的類別，衍生自。 is used to describe settings properties of a class derived from . 設定 API 允許設定屬性，以分組為 common language runtime 類別的集合。The Settings API allows a collection of settings properties to be grouped into a common language runtime class. 保存設定時基底類別會要求的集合集合中的類型分組的物件。When persisting settings, the base class asks for a collection of objects, grouped in a collection of type . 它會藉由呼叫其本身的屬性成員。It does this by calling its own Properties member. 繼承的類別應該會傳回要保存屬性的集合。Inherited classes should return a collection of properties to persist. 每個物件包含的屬性，包括相關的中繼資料：Each object includes metadata about the property, including the following: - 名稱。Name. - 預設值。Default value. - 屬性型別。Property type. - 序列化方法。Serialization method. - 要用於持續性提供者。Provider to use for persistence. - 其他內容和提供者特定的任意屬性。Other arbitrary attributes that are context and provider specific.
